name: osm
description: This file contains details of the assets used by the OSM template.

assets.name: template.osm.ltr
assets.description: The css file to be used when the site is left to right (LTR).

assets.name: template.osm.rtl
assets.description: The css file to be used when the site is right to left (RTL).

assets.name: template.osm.custom.ltr
assets.description: Custom CSS file for individual sites to override styles or inject extra styles when in LTR.

assets.name: template.osm.custom.rtl
assets.description: Custom CSS file for individual sites to override styles or inject extra styles when in RTL.

assets.name: template.active.language
assets.description: An asset to allow language specific css, eg 'language/[lang-CODE]/[lang-CODE].css', to use it as a dependency to the active template

assets.name: template.osm
assets.description: The file containing the javascript for this template.
